definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: disturb (NH Hiph. move to and fro; perh. transp. from Ar. ra9aja disturb, Ba:ES 8);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. Job 26:12 [[בְּכׂחוֹ רָגַע הַיָם]]; Pt. cstr. (Ges:65d. 116 g. x), Je 31:35 = Is 51:15 [[רׂגַע הַיָם]] [[וַיֶהֱמוּ גַלָּיו]].

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: denom. from [[רֶבַע]] make a twinkling, only 1 S. Impf. cohort. [[וְעַד אִרְגִּ֫יעָה ]] [[לְשׁוֹן שָָׁקֶר]] and while I would twinkle (= only for a moment: cf. Job 20:5) is the false tongue opp. [[תִּכּוֹן לָעַד]], Pr 12:19 (cf. De); and [[כִּי אִרְגִּ֫יעָה ]]. [[אֲרִיעֶנּוּ מֵעָלֶיתָ]] I will twinkle and (= I will in a moment, Ges:§ 120 g; cf. Hi) chase them away from it, Je 49:19 = Je 50:44. (Ba:§ 86 as subst. = [[רֶגַע]], of the very rare type ’aqtîl; [[ה]]-; as Ges:§ 90 f.)
